#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int c[1000001];
int main()
{
    int n,i,j,t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        scanf("%d",&n);
        int a[n],b[n];
        memset(c,0,1000001*sizeof(int));
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++){
            scanf("%d",&a[i]);
            b[i]=0;
        }
        for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
            c[a[j]]=c[a[j]]+1;
        for(i=0;i<=1000000;i++)
            c[i]=c[i]+c[i-1];
        for(j=n;j>=1;j--)
        {
            b[c[a[j]]]=a[j];
           c[a[j]]=c[a[j]]-1;
        //printf("%d\n",a[j]);
        }
       // for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        //printf("%d ",b[i]);
        i=1;
        j=n;
        while(i<=j)
        {
            if(i==j)
                printf("%d",b[i]);
            else
                printf("%d %d ",b[j],b[i]);
                i++;
                j--;
        }
        printf("\n");

    }

    return 0;
}
